duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate shipping between manufacturing plants and construction project sites.
Organize dispatch schedule for all shipping with company drivers.
Create shipping documents and order permits for transporting oversize loads.
Hire police escorts, bucket trucks, and civilian escorts when needed.
Plan routes for oversize loads and organize invoices for all vendors used for shipping purposes.
Coordinate 3rd party carriers when needed for shipping product and review drivers' logs for compliance.
